  • Method Details

    • testMakeSimpleStep

      public void testMakeSimpleStep(EnvelopeFinder eAgent, EFState targetState) throws org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException
      This function should execute the next step of the agent, and then assert whether the resulting state is equal to the targetState
      Parameters:
      eAgent - EnvelopeFinder agent
      targetState - the state that should be equal to the resulting state of the agent after performing the next step
      Throws:
      org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException - in case of a contradiction adding clauses

    • readTargetStateFromFile

      public EFState readTargetStateFromFile(BufferedReader br, int wDim) throws IOException
      Read a state from the current position of the file through the BufferedReader object
      Parameters:
      br - BufferedReader object interface to the opened file of states
      wDim - dimension of the world
      Returns:
      the state read from the file
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of error reading the files

    • testMakeSeqOfSteps

      public void testMakeSeqOfSteps(int wDim, int numSteps, String fileSteps, String fileStates, String fileEnvelopes) throws org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException
      This function should run the sequence of steps stored in the file fileSteps, but only up to numSteps steps.
      Parameters:
      wDim - the dimension of world
      numSteps - num of steps to perform
      fileSteps - file name with sequence of steps to perform
      fileStates - file name with sequence of target states, that should be the resulting states after each movement in fileSteps
      fileEnvelopes - file name with sequence of envelopes
      Throws:
      org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException - in case of a contradiction adding clauses

    • TWorldTest0

      public void TWorldTest0() throws org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException
      This is an example test. You must replicate this method for each different test sequence, or use some kind of parametric tests with junit
      Throws:
      org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException - in case of a contradiction adding clauses

    • TWorldTest1

      public void TWorldTest1() throws org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException
      This is the first test. test1 (states1.txt steps1.txt envelopes1.txt): 5x5 world, 5 steps , envelopes at 2,2 4,4
      Throws:
      org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException - in case of a contradiction adding clauses
